properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Manasquan Inlet to Little Egg Inlet NJ out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 12:36PM EST until January 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Manasquan Inlet to Little Egg
Inlet NJ out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening
to 6 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low pressure intensifying offshore will
lead to quickly changing conditions late this evening. There
will be an improvement in conditions overnight before gale force
winds develop on Wednesday.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY
